sqlMap.select: SELECT FACT.FACT_ID as factId, FACT.TEST_DIM_ID as testDimId, FACT.DEMOGRAPHIC_DIM_ID as demographicDimId, FACT.ORG_NODE_DIM_ID as orgNodeDimId, FACT.ORG_NODE_DIM_VERSION_ID as orgNodeDimVersionId, FACT.ADMIN_DIM_ID as adminDimId, FACT.STUDENT_DIM_ID as studentDimId, FACT.STUDENT_DIM_VERSION_ID as studentDimVersionId, FACT.CURRICULUM_DIM_ID as curriculumDimId, FACT.COHORT_GROUP_ID as cohortGroupId, FACT.EXT_ELM_ID as extElmId, FACT.CUSTOMER as customer, FACT.TESTED_FLAG as testedFlag, FACT.SCORE_DATE as scoreDate, FACT.STUDENT_GRADE_LEVEL as studentGradeLevel, FACT.STUDENT_AGE_MONTHS as studentAgeMonths, FACT.STUDENT_AGE_YEARS as studentAgeYears, FACT.TEACHER_NAME as teacherName, FACT.PASS_FAIL_FLAG as passFailFlag, FACT.RETEST_FLAG as retestFlag, FACT.RESCORE_FLAG as rescoreFlag, FACT.MATCH_QUALITY as matchQuality, FACT.NUMBER_ATTEMPTED as numberAttempted, FACT.NUMBER_CORRECT as numberCorrect, FACT.PERCENT_CORRECT as percentCorrect, FACT.SCALE_SCORE as scaleScore, FACT.GRADE_EQUIVALENT as gradeEquivalent, FACT.NORMAL_CURVE_EQUIVALENT as normalCurveEquivalent, FACT.STANDARD_ERROR_OF_MEASUREMENT as standardErrorOfMeasurement, FACT.NATIONAL_STANINE_BY_GRADE as nationalStanineByGrade, FACT.NATIONAL_PERCENTILE_BY_GRADE as nationalPercentileByGrade, FACT.NATIONAL_STANINE_BY_AGE as nationalStanineByAge, FACT.NATIONAL_PERCENTILE_BY_AGE as nationalPercentileByAge, FACT.LOCAL_STANINE_BY_GRADE as localStanineByGrade, FACT.LOCAL_PERCENTILE_BY_GRADE as localPercentileByGrade, FACT.LOCAL_STANINE_BY_AGE as localStanineByAge, FACT.LOCAL_PERCENTILE_BY_AGE as localPercentileByAge, FACT.CSI_LOWER_BOUND as csiLowerBound, FACT.COGNITIVE_SKILLS_INDEX as cognitiveSkillsIndex, FACT.PERFORMANCE_LEVEL as performanceLevel, FACT.CSI_UPPER_BOUND as csiUpperBound, FACT.OBJECTIVE_MASTERY_SCORE as objectiveMasteryScore, FACT.OBJECTIVE_PERF_INDICATOR as objectivePerfIndicator, FACT.ACCOMMODATIONS as accommodations, FACT.EXCEPTIONALITY as exceptionality, FACT.ANT_ACHIEVE_SCALE_SCORE as antAchieveScaleScore, FACT.INCLUDE_IN_SUMMARIES as includeInSummaries, FACT.ANT_ACHIEVE_GRADE_EQUIVALENT as antAchieveGradeEquivalent, FACT.VALID_SCORE as validScore, FACT.ANT_ACHIEVE_NORMAL_CURVE_EQUIV as antAchieveNormalCurveEquiv, FACT.SCORE_1_NAME as score1Name, FACT.ANT_ACHIEVE_NATIONAL_STANINE as antAchieveNationalStanine, FACT.ANT_ACHIEVE_NATIONAL_PERCENT as antAchieveNationalPercent, FACT.FILE_NAME as fileName, FACT.SCORE_1_VALUE as score1Value, FACT.FILE_ID as fileId, FACT.SCORE_2_NAME as score2Name, FACT.SCORE_2_VALUE as score2Value, FACT.SCORE_3_NAME as score3Name, FACT.SCORE_3_VALUE as score3Value, FACT.SCORE_4_NAME as score4Name, FACT.SCORE_4_VALUE as score4Value, FACT.SCORE_5_NAME as score5Name, FACT.SCORE_5_VALUE as score5Value, FACT.SCORE_6_NAME as score6Name, FACT.SCORE_6_VALUE as score6Value, FACT.SCORE_7_NAME as score7Name, FACT.SCORE_7_VALUE as score7Value, FACT.SCORE_8_NAME as score8Name, FACT.SCORE_8_VALUE as score8Value, FACT.SCORE_9_NAME as score9Name, FACT.SCORE_9_VALUE as score9Value, FACT.SCORE_10_NAME as score10Name, FACT.SCORE_10_VALUE as score10Value, FACT.CREATED_BY as createdBy, FACT.CREATED_DATE as createdDate, FACT.LAST_UPDATED_BY as lastUpdatedBy, FACT.LAST_UPDATED_DATE as lastUpdatedDate, FACT.OBJECTIVE_PERF_INDEX as objectivePerfIndex, FACT.MASTERY_INDICATOR as masteryIndicator, FACT.MASTERY_CUTSCORE as masteryCutscore, FACT.PARTIAL_MASTERY_CUTSCORE as partialMasteryCutscore, FACT.SIGNIFICANT_DIFFERENCE as significantDifference, FACT.IMAGE_ID as imageId, FACT.PERFORMANCE_LEVEL_CODE as performanceLevelCode, FACT.NUM_INCORRECT as numIncorrect, FACT.NUM_UNATTEMPTED as numUnattempted, FACT.POINTS_POSSIBLE as pointsPossible, FACT.POINTS_OBTAINED as pointsObtained, FACT.PERCENT_OBTAINED as percentObtained, FACT.POINTS_ATTEMPTED as pointsAttempted, FACT.ITEM_SET_LEVEL as itemSetLevel, FACT.NATIONAL_PERCENTILE as nationalPercentile, FACT.HIGH_NATIONAL_PERCENTILE as highNationalPercentile, FACT.LOW_NATIONAL_PERCENTILE as lowNationalPercentile, FACT.NATIONAL_STANINE as nationalStanine, FACT.PERCENT_OBJECTIVE_MASTERY as percentObjectiveMastery, FACT.MESSAGE as message, FACT.PREDICTED_GED as predictedGed, FACT.NORM_GROUP as normGroup, FACT.NORM_YEAR as normYear, CURR.NAME as contentAreaName FROM STS_TEST_RESULT_FACT FACT, STS_CURRICULUM_DIM CURR WHERE CURR.CURRICULUM_DIM_ID = FACT.CURRICULUM_DIM_ID AND fact.STUDENT_DIM_ID = #studentDimId:NUMERIC# AND fact.ADMIN_DIM_ID = #adminDimId:NUMERIC# AND CURR.NAME = #contentAreaName:VARCHAR#

SELECT FACT.FACT_ID as factId, FACT.TEST_DIM_ID as testDimId, FACT.DEMOGRAPHIC_DIM_ID as demographicDimId, FACT.ORG_NODE_DIM_ID as orgNodeDimId, FACT.ORG_NODE_DIM_VERSION_ID as orgNodeDimVersionId, FACT.ADMIN_DIM_ID as adminDimId, FACT.STUDENT_DIM_ID as studentDimId, FACT.STUDENT_DIM_VERSION_ID as studentDimVersionId, FACT.CURRICULUM_DIM_ID as curriculumDimId, FACT.COHORT_GROUP_ID as cohortGroupId, FACT.EXT_ELM_ID as extElmId, FACT.CUSTOMER as customer, FACT.TESTED_FLAG as testedFlag, FACT.SCORE_DATE as scoreDate, FACT.STUDENT_GRADE_LEVEL as studentGradeLevel, FACT.STUDENT_AGE_MONTHS as studentAgeMonths, FACT.STUDENT_AGE_YEARS as studentAgeYears, FACT.TEACHER_NAME as teacherName, FACT.PASS_FAIL_FLAG as passFailFlag, FACT.RETEST_FLAG as retestFlag, FACT.RESCORE_FLAG as rescoreFlag, FACT.MATCH_QUALITY as matchQuality, FACT.NUMBER_ATTEMPTED as numberAttempted, FACT.NUMBER_CORRECT as numberCorrect, FACT.PERCENT_CORRECT as percentCorrect, FACT.SCALE_SCORE as scaleScore, FACT.GRADE_EQUIVALENT as gradeEquivalent, FACT.NORMAL_CURVE_EQUIVALENT as normalCurveEquivalent, FACT.STANDARD_ERROR_OF_MEASUREMENT as standardErrorOfMeasurement, FACT.NATIONAL_PERCENTILE_BY_AGE as nationalPercentileByAge, FACT.LOCAL_STANINE_BY_GRADE as localStanineByGrade, FACT.LOCAL_PERCENTILE_BY_GRADE as localPercentileByGrade, FACT.LOCAL_STANINE_BY_AGE as localStanineByAge, FACT.LOCAL_PERCENTILE_BY_AGE as localPercentileByAge, FACT.CSI_LOWER_BOUND as csiLowerBound, FACT.COGNITIVE_SKILLS_INDEX as cognitiveSkillsIndex, FACT.PERFORMANCE_LEVEL as performanceLevel, FACT.CSI_UPPER_BOUND as csiUpperBound, FACT.OBJECTIVE_MASTERY_SCORE as objectiveMasteryScore, FACT.OBJECTIVE_PERF_INDICATOR as objectivePerfIndicator, FACT.ACCOMMODATIONS as accommodations, FACT.EXCEPTIONALITY as exceptionality, FACT.ANT_ACHIEVE_SCALE_SCORE as antAchieveScaleScore, FACT.INCLUDE_IN_SUMMARIES as includeInSummaries, FACT.ANT_ACHIEVE_GRADE_EQUIVALENT as antAchieveGradeEquivalent, FACT.VALID_SCORE as validScore, FACT.ANT_ACHIEVE_NORMAL_CURVE_EQUIV as antAchieveNormalCurveEquiv, FACT.SCORE_1_NAME as score1Name, FACT.ANT_ACHIEVE_NATIONAL_STANINE as antAchieveNationalStanine, FACT.ANT_ACHIEVE_NATIONAL_PERCENT as antAchieveNationalPercent, FACT.FILE_NAME as fileName, FACT.SCORE_1_VALUE as score1Value, FACT.FILE_ID as fileId, FACT.SCORE_2_NAME as score2Name, FACT.SCORE_2_VALUE as score2Value, FACT.SCORE_3_NAME as score3Name, FACT.SCORE_3_VALUE as score3Value, FACT.SCORE_4_NAME as score4Name, FACT.SCORE_4_VALUE as score4Value, FACT.SCORE_5_NAME as score5Name, FACT.SCORE_5_VALUE as score5Value, FACT.SCORE_6_NAME as score6Name, FACT.SCORE_6_VALUE as score6Value, FACT.SCORE_7_NAME as score7Name, FACT.SCORE_7_VALUE as score7Value, FACT.SCORE_8_NAME as score8Name, FACT.SCORE_8_VALUE as score8Value, FACT.SCORE_9_NAME as score9Name, FACT.SCORE_9_VALUE as score9Value, FACT.SCORE_10_NAME as score10Name, FACT.SCORE_10_VALUE as score10Value, FACT.CREATED_BY as createdBy, FACT.CREATED_DATE as createdDate, FACT.LAST_UPDATED_BY as lastUpdatedBy, FACT.LAST_UPDATED_DATE as lastUpdatedDate, FACT.OBJECTIVE_PERF_INDEX as objectivePerfIndex, FACT.MASTERY_INDICATOR as masteryIndicator, FACT.MASTERY_CUTSCORE as masteryCutscore, FACT.PARTIAL_MASTERY_CUTSCORE as partialMasteryCutscore, FACT.SIGNIFICANT_DIFFERENCE as significantDifference, FACT.IMAGE_ID as imageId, FACT.PERFORMANCE_LEVEL_CODE as performanceLevelCode, FACT.NUM_INCORRECT as numIncorrect, FACT.NUM_UNATTEMPTED as numUnattempted, FACT.POINTS_POSSIBLE as pointsPossible, FACT.POINTS_OBTAINED as pointsObtained, FACT.PERCENT_OBTAINED as percentObtained, FACT.POINTS_ATTEMPTED as pointsAttempted, FACT.ITEM_SET_LEVEL as itemSetLevel, FACT.NATIONAL_PERCENTILE as nationalPercentile, FACT.HIGH_NATIONAL_PERCENTILE as highNationalPercentile, FACT.LOW_NATIONAL_PERCENTILE as lowNationalPercentile, FACT.NATIONAL_STANINE as nationalStanine, FACT.PERCENT_OBJECTIVE_MASTERY as percentObjectiveMastery, FACT.MESSAGE as message, FACT.PREDICTED_GED as predictedGed, FACT.NORM_GROUP as normGroup, FACT.NORM_YEAR as normYear, CURR.NAME as contentAreaName FROM STS_TEST_RESULT_FACT FACT, STS_CURRICULUM_DIM CURR WHERE CURR.CURRICULUM_DIM_ID = FACT.CURRICULUM_DIM_ID AND FACT_ID = #factId:NUMERIC#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO STS_TEST_RESULT_FACT ( TEST_DIM_ID, DEMOGRAPHIC_DIM_ID, ORG_NODE_DIM_ID, ORG_NODE_DIM_VERSION_ID, ADMIN_DIM_ID, STUDENT_DIM_ID, STUDENT_DIM_VERSION_ID, CURRICULUM_DIM_ID, COHORT_GROUP_ID, EXT_ELM_ID, CUSTOMER, TESTED_FLAG, SCORE_DATE, STUDENT_GRADE_LEVEL, STUDENT_AGE_MONTHS, STUDENT_AGE_YEARS, TEACHER_NAME, PASS_FAIL_FLAG, RETEST_FLAG, RESCORE_FLAG, MATCH_QUALITY, NUMBER_ATTEMPTED, NUMBER_CORRECT, PERCENT_CORRECT, SCALE_SCORE, GRADE_EQUIVALENT, NORMAL_CURVE_EQUIVALENT, STANDARD_ERROR_OF_MEASUREMENT, NATIONAL_STANINE_BY_GRADE, NATIONAL_PERCENTILE_BY_GRADE, NATIONAL_STANINE_BY_AGE, NATIONAL_PERCENTILE_BY_AGE, LOCAL_STANINE_BY_GRADE, LOCAL_PERCENTILE_BY_GRADE, LOCAL_STANINE_BY_AGE, LOCAL_PERCENTILE_BY_AGE, CSI_LOWER_BOUND, COGNITIVE_SKILLS_INDEX, PERFORMANCE_LEVEL, CSI_UPPER_BOUND, OBJECTIVE_MASTERY_SCORE, OBJECTIVE_PERF_INDICATOR, ACCOMMODATIONS, EXCEPTIONALITY, ANT_ACHIEVE_SCALE_SCORE, INCLUDE_IN_SUMMARIES, ANT_ACHIEVE_GRADE_EQUIVALENT, VALID_SCORE, ANT_ACHIEVE_NORMAL_CURVE_EQUIV, SCORE_1_NAME, ANT_ACHIEVE_NATIONAL_STANINE, ANT_ACHIEVE_NATIONAL_PERCENT, FILE_NAME, SCORE_1_VALUE, FILE_ID, SCORE_2_NAME, SCORE_2_VALUE, SCORE_3_NAME, SCORE_3_VALUE, SCORE_4_NAME, SCORE_4_VALUE, SCORE_5_NAME, SCORE_5_VALUE, SCORE_6_NAME, SCORE_6_VALUE, SCORE_7_NAME, SCORE_7_VALUE, SCORE_8_NAME, SCORE_8_VALUE, SCORE_9_NAME, SCORE_9_VALUE, SCORE_10_NAME, SCORE_10_VALUE, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_DATE, OBJECTIVE_PERF_INDEX, MASTERY_INDICATOR, MASTERY_CUTSCORE, PARTIAL_MASTERY_CUTSCORE, SIGNIFICANT_DIFFERENCE, IMAGE_ID, PERFORMANCE_LEVEL_CODE, NUM_INCORRECT, NUM_UNATTEMPTED, POINTS_POSSIBLE, POINTS_OBTAINED, PERCENT_OBTAINED, POINTS_ATTEMPTED, ITEM_SET_LEVEL, NATIONAL_PERCENTILE, HIGH_NATIONAL_PERCENTILE, LOW_NATIONAL_PERCENTILE, NATIONAL_STANINE, PERCENT_OBJECTIVE_MASTERY, MESSAGE, PREDICTED_GED, NORM_GROUP, NORM_YEAR ) VALUES ( #testDimId:NUMERIC#, #demographicDimId:NUMERIC#, #orgNodeDimId:NUMERIC#, #orgNodeDimVersionId:NUMERIC#, #adminDimId:NUMERIC#, #studentDimId:NUMERIC#, #studentDimVersionId:NUMERIC#, #curriculumDimId:NUMERIC#, #cohortGroupId:NUMERIC#, #extElmId:VARCHAR#, #customer:VARCHAR#, #testedFlag:VARCHAR#, #scoreDate:TIMESTAMP#, #studentGradeLevel:VARCHAR#, #studentAgeMonths:NUMERIC#, #studentAgeYears:NUMERIC#, #teacherName:VARCHAR#, #passFailFlag:VARCHAR#, #retestFlag:VARCHAR#, #rescoreFlag:VARCHAR#, #matchQuality:VARCHAR#, #numberAttempted:NUMERIC#, #numberCorrect:NUMERIC#, #percentCorrect:NUMERIC#, #scaleScore:NUMERIC#, #gradeEquivalent:VARCHAR#, #normalCurveEquivalent:NUMERIC#, #standardErrorOfMeasurement:NUMERIC#, #nationalStanineByGrade:NUMERIC#, #nationalPercentileByGrade:NUMERIC#, #nationalStanineByAge:NUMERIC#, #nationalPercentileByAge:NUMERIC#, #localStanineByGrade:NUMERIC#, #localPercentileByGrade:NUMERIC#, #localStanineByAge:NUMERIC#, #localPercentileByAge:NUMERIC#, #csiLowerBound:NUMERIC#, #cognitiveSkillsIndex:NUMERIC#, #performanceLevel:VARCHAR#, #csiUpperBound:NUMERIC#, #objectiveMasteryScore:NUMERIC#, #objectivePerfIndicator:VARCHAR#, #accommodations:VARCHAR#, #exceptionality:VARCHAR#, #antAchieveScaleScore:NUMERIC#, #includeInSummaries:VARCHAR#, #antAchieveGradeEquivalent:VARCHAR#, #validScore:VARCHAR#, #antAchieveNormalCurveEquiv:NUMERIC#, #score1Name:VARCHAR#, #antAchieveNationalStanine:NUMERIC#, #antAchieveNationalPercent:NUMERIC#, #fileName:VARCHAR#, #score1Value:NUMERIC#, #fileId:NUMERIC#, #score2Name:VARCHAR#, #score2Value:NUMERIC#, #score3Name:VARCHAR#, #score3Value:NUMERIC#, #score4Name:VARCHAR#, #score4Value:NUMERIC#, #score5Name:VARCHAR#, #score5Value:NUMERIC#, #score6Name:VARCHAR#, #score6Value:VARCHAR#, #score7Name:VARCHAR#, #score7Value:VARCHAR#, #score8Name:VARCHAR#, #score8Value:VARCHAR#, #score9Name:VARCHAR#, #score9Value:VARCHAR#, #score10Name:VARCHAR#, #score10Value:VARCHAR#, #createdBy:VARCHAR#, #createdDate:TIMESTAMP#, #lastUpdatedBy:VARCHAR#, #lastUpdatedDate:TIMESTAMP#, #objectivePerfIndex:NUMERIC#, #masteryIndicator:VARCHAR#, #masteryCutscore:NUMERIC#, #partialMasteryCutscore:NUMERIC#, #significantDifference:VARCHAR#, #imageId:VARCHAR#, #performanceLevelCode:VARCHAR#, #numIncorrect:NUMERIC#, #numUnattempted:NUMERIC#, #pointsPossible:NUMERIC#, #pointsObtained:NUMERIC#, #percentObtained:NUMERIC#, #pointsAttempted:NUMERIC#, #itemSetLevel:VARCHAR#, #nationalPercentile:NUMERIC#, #highNationalPercentile:NUMERIC#, #lowNationalPercentile:NUMERIC#, #nationalStanine:NUMERIC#, #percentObjectiveMastery:NUMERIC#, #message:VARCHAR#, #predictedGed:NUMERIC#, #normGroup:VARCHAR#, #normYear:VARCHAR# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE STS_TEST_RESULT_FACT SET TEST_DIM_ID = #testDimId:NUMERIC#, DEMOGRAPHIC_DIM_ID = #demographicDimId:NUMERIC#, ORG_NODE_DIM_ID = #orgNodeDimId:NUMERIC#, ORG_NODE_DIM_VERSION_ID = #orgNodeDimVersionId:NUMERIC#, ADMIN_DIM_ID = #adminDimId:NUMERIC#, STUDENT_DIM_ID = #studentDimId:NUMERIC#, STUDENT_DIM_VERSION_ID = #studentDimVersionId:NUMERIC#, CURRICULUM_DIM_ID = #curriculumDimId:NUMERIC#, COHORT_GROUP_ID = #cohortGroupId:NUMERIC#, EXT_ELM_ID = #extElmId:VARCHAR#, CUSTOMER = #customer:VARCHAR#, TESTED_FLAG = #testedFlag:VARCHAR#, SCORE_DATE = #scoreDate:TIMESTAMP#, STUDENT_GRADE_LEVEL = #studentGradeLevel:VARCHAR#, STUDENT_AGE_MONTHS = #studentAgeMonths:NUMERIC#, STUDENT_AGE_YEARS = #studentAgeYears:NUMERIC#, TEACHER_NAME = #teacherName:VARCHAR#, PASS_FAIL_FLAG = #passFailFlag:VARCHAR#, RETEST_FLAG = #retestFlag:VARCHAR#, RESCORE_FLAG = #rescoreFlag:VARCHAR#, MATCH_QUALITY = #matchQuality:VARCHAR#, NUMBER_ATTEMPTED = #numberAttempted:NUMERIC#, NUMBER_CORRECT = #numberCorrect:NUMERIC#, PERCENT_CORRECT = #percentCorrect:NUMERIC#, SCALE_SCORE = #scaleScore:NUMERIC#, GRADE_EQUIVALENT = #gradeEquivalent:VARCHAR#, NORMAL_CURVE_EQUIVALENT = #normalCurveEquivalent:NUMERIC#, STANDARD_ERROR_OF_MEASUREMENT = #standardErrorOfMeasurement:NUMERIC#, NATIONAL_STANINE_BY_GRADE = #nationalStanineByGrade:NUMERIC#, NATIONAL_PERCENTILE_BY_GRADE = #nationalPercentileByGrade:NUMERIC#, NATIONAL_STANINE_BY_AGE = #nationalStanineByAge:NUMERIC#, NATIONAL_PERCENTILE_BY_AGE = #nationalPercentileByAge:NUMERIC#, LOCAL_STANINE_BY_GRADE = #localStanineByGrade:NUMERIC#, LOCAL_PERCENTILE_BY_GRADE = #localPercentileByGrade:NUMERIC#, LOCAL_STANINE_BY_AGE = #localStanineByAge:NUMERIC#, LOCAL_PERCENTILE_BY_AGE = #localPercentileByAge:NUMERIC#, CSI_LOWER_BOUND = #csiLowerBound:NUMERIC#, COGNITIVE_SKILLS_INDEX = #cognitiveSkillsIndex:NUMERIC#, PERFORMANCE_LEVEL = #performanceLevel:VARCHAR#, CSI_UPPER_BOUND = #csiUpperBound:NUMERIC#, OBJECTIVE_MASTERY_SCORE = #objectiveMasteryScore:NUMERIC#, OBJECTIVE_PERF_INDICATOR = #objectivePerfIndicator:VARCHAR#, ACCOMMODATIONS = #accommodations:VARCHAR#, EXCEPTIONALITY = #exceptionality:VARCHAR#, ANT_ACHIEVE_SCALE_SCORE = #antAchieveScaleScore:NUMERIC#, INCLUDE_IN_SUMMARIES = #includeInSummaries:VARCHAR#, ANT_ACHIEVE_GRADE_EQUIVALENT = #antAchieveGradeEquivalent:VARCHAR#, VALID_SCORE = #validScore:VARCHAR#, ANT_ACHIEVE_NORMAL_CURVE_EQUIV = #antAchieveNormalCurveEquiv:NUMERIC#, SCORE_1_NAME = #score1Name:VARCHAR#, ANT_ACHIEVE_NATIONAL_STANINE = #antAchieveNationalStanine:NUMERIC#, ANT_ACHIEVE_NATIONAL_PERCENT = #antAchieveNationalPercent:NUMERIC#, FILE_NAME = #fileName:VARCHAR#, SCORE_1_VALUE = #score1Value:NUMERIC#, FILE_ID = #fileId:NUMERIC#, SCORE_2_NAME = #score2Name:VARCHAR#, SCORE_2_VALUE = #score2Value:NUMERIC#, SCORE_3_NAME = #score3Name:VARCHAR#, SCORE_3_VALUE = #score3Value:NUMERIC#, SCORE_4_NAME = #score4Name:VARCHAR#, SCORE_4_VALUE = #score4Value:NUMERIC#, SCORE_5_NAME = #score5Name:VARCHAR#, SCORE_5_VALUE = #score5Value:NUMERIC#, SCORE_6_NAME = #score6Name:VARCHAR#, SCORE_6_VALUE = #score6Value:VARCHAR#, SCORE_7_NAME = #score7Name:VARCHAR#, SCORE_7_VALUE = #score7Value:VARCHAR#, SCORE_8_NAME = #score8Name:VARCHAR#, SCORE_8_VALUE = #score8Value:VARCHAR#, SCORE_9_NAME = #score9Name:VARCHAR#, SCORE_9_VALUE = #score9Value:VARCHAR#, SCORE_10_NAME = #score10Name:VARCHAR#, SCORE_10_VALUE = #score10Value:VARCHAR#, CREATED_BY = #createdBy:VARCHAR#, CREATED_DATE = #createdDate:TIMESTAMP#, LAST_UPDATED_BY = #lastUpdatedBy:VARCHAR#, LAST_UPDATED_DATE = #lastUpdatedDate:TIMESTAMP#, OBJECTIVE_PERF_INDEX = #objectivePerfIndex:NUMERIC#, MASTERY_INDICATOR = #masteryIndicator:VARCHAR#, MASTERY_CUTSCORE = #masteryCutscore:NUMERIC#, PARTIAL_MASTERY_CUTSCORE = #partialMasteryCutscore:NUMERIC#, SIGNIFICANT_DIFFERENCE = #significantDifference:VARCHAR#, IMAGE_ID = #imageId:VARCHAR#, PERFORMANCE_LEVEL_CODE = #performanceLevelCode:VARCHAR#, NUM_INCORRECT = #numIncorrect:NUMERIC#, NUM_UNATTEMPTED = #numUnattempted:NUMERIC#, POINTS_POSSIBLE = #pointsPossible:NUMERIC#, POINTS_OBTAINED = #pointsObtained:NUMERIC#, PERCENT_OBTAINED = #percentObtained:NUMERIC#, POINTS_ATTEMPTED = #pointsAttempted:NUMERIC#, ITEM_SET_LEVEL = #itemSetLevel:VARCHAR#, NATIONAL_PERCENTILE = #nationalPercentile:NUMERIC#, HIGH_NATIONAL_PERCENTILE = #highNationalPercentile:NUMERIC#, LOW_NATIONAL_PERCENTILE = #lowNationalPercentile:NUMERIC#, NATIONAL_STANINE = #nationalStanine:NUMERIC#, PERCENT_OBJECTIVE_MASTERY = #percentObjectiveMastery:NUMERIC#, MESSAGE = #message:VARCHAR#, PREDICTED_GED = #predictedGed:NUMERIC#, NORM_GROUP = #normGroup:VARCHAR#, NORM_YEAR = #normYear:VARCHAR# WHERE FACT_ID = #factId:NUMERIC#
